Eye lubricant drops.dosage: 1-2 drops in the affected eye(s) as needed

Antihistamine eye drops.dosage: 1 drop in each eye twice daily (every 8-12 hours)

Steroid eye drops.dosage: 1-2 drops 2-4 times daily, taper as directed by a doctor

Atropine eye drops.dosage: 0.01% once daily, typically in the evening

Vuity (pilocarpine hydrochloride).dosage: 1 drop in each eye once daily

Qlosi (pilocarpine hydrochloride).dosage: 1 drop in each eye once daily

Cyclosporine (Restasis).dosage: 1 drop in each eye twice daily, 12 hours apart

Lifitegrast (Xiidra).dosage: 1 drop in each eye twice daily, 12 hours apart

Tryvaya (Oyster Point).dosage: 1 spray in each nostril twice daily

Eysuvis.dosage: 1-2 drops in each eye 4 times daily for up to 2 weeks
